App Developer- Rupesh Kumar
 B.Tech CSE(Passout Batch 2021)
 at Lovely Professional University, Punjab, India
 The Project is created under the Summer Training (Batch June-July ) by Board Infinity
 Special Thanks to the trainer- Aditya Gkar 
 Coffee Time is made with the aim of contributing and helping open source community for the betterment of food ordering system.
 Key Features of the app-
 • The App has a Signup/ Login System which keeps track of the User Database and their respected orders.
 • It has a best in class User Interface and easy to place order system.
 • Order option in navigation menu shows the order placed list and calculate the final cost with respect to the price and quantity selected for each item.
 • It has a broadcast sender which shows you option to place the order by Email.
 • The app is currently working on SQLite Database (Local) and can be easily modified to online real time databases such as Firebase, My SQL or Volley API etc.
 • You can easily view the user database and orders record at login page(settings icon).
